text: It's a very free place to write in, and there's the advantage that no one knows what you're writing about anyway.'Not that I did much when I was over this past two times, not with that great little Irish bar on Seventh Avenue, The Pigsty, always open. I was there, in even faster orbit, when that third astronaut went up-what's his name?
